website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech G533 is a comfortable wireless gaming headset with few connection options and perhaps too much bass.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Amazing sound, perfectly balanced and clear. Good bass and clear mids and highs. You can definitely enjoy music on these things. Positional audio is perfect as well. -Great battery life, over 16 hours -Lag free wireless -Ecxellent app support -Nice design, doesn't scream 'gamer'. -Microphone is nice and clear. -Feels nicely made and put together. Cons: -Earpad material, I think some velour or microfiber cloth would have been a lot better. The 'sports mesh' isn't the best. But I don't mind too much personally. -Microphone could do with a bit more bass... this headset gets a lot of flak for this but I honestly think it undeserved. All things considered 4.5/5. They sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: E.B

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a pair of Senheiser HD6xx's with a Fiio E10k DAC and ModMic for gaming but got sick of all the wires, so I bought these to go wireless. They are a lot better than I expected. Sound quality isn't as good as my HD6xx but for gaming and ease of use the trade off is worth it. I tried the Logitech G933, which is more expensive, and I hated them. If anything the G533 seems to be a lot better than the G933, especially in build quality. I find myself not even using my HD6xx's anymore just because of the convenience of wireless, even though the HD6xx has clearly better sound.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: This is the most ANNOYING headset I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Good sound quality - Comfortable to wear Cons: - Incredibly buggy and annoying. Look up the Logitech G533 constant disconnect reconnect bug. When charging it will turn off and on repeatedly whilst disconnecting and reconnecting to Windows. - You can hear a dry scratching through your earpieces whenever something touches your mic Do. Not. Buy. This. Headset. It's a shame because I've enjoyed Logitech products over the years and this has put me off ever purchasing another product. Note: This headphone is perfectly usable for 3-4 hours of gaming if you charge it overnight. Just never game when you need to wire them in.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: overall a solid headset though not very bassy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of headphones. Sound quality is awesome, and the headset feels shockingly light on your head despite the size, which is definitely the worse part of these headphones. They look super geeky on top of your head and if that's not your cup of tea you will have to look elsewhere. However, the comfort is amazing for these wireless headphines and the dongle is decent sized. Where as some companies utilise large stands as relievers or super small usb units that are easily lost. This is much better. The sound quality is immaculate although the bass isn't super heavy, it gets a pretty flat tone and the accompanying g hub app is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Muneeb J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones, good battery life (10 to 12 hours), the microphone has good voice recording quality, clear and crisp, the sound quality is very good. Well balanced sound with not to much bass, the volume is not very high so I use mine at 100% volume all the time (and still get 10 hours battery life). Never dropped connection, range is quite good as well and is comfortable to wear long periods of time for me. Can be charged while using but it will not use USB cable for audio, it will still need and use the USB dongle so you need 2 USB ports for it for long gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: W0lfy

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding, comfortable headset
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good, and comfortable to wear. Easy to set up (just plugged in and it worked). It can be used whilst charging which is good. Batter seems to last for quite a long time. Not perfect though- it makes odd beeps, and there's no manual to tell you what that means. The mic can be muted by flipping it up, and it often doesn't unmute when moved down-have to go to the windows sound settings to unmute. Not the greatest looking thing. Biggest flaw though is that there's no wired input. Not the end of the world if you're only using it as a gaming headset on pc, but it does mean you can only use it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are right
customer_reviews.text: I watched countless reviews about these headphones and they are spot on. The surround sound from to speakers is totally amazing. I already have surround sound speakers for gaming but needed a solution for the evening when the kids are asleep. I was amazed by how good the surround sound was. The quality is not quite bose but still good. The comfort level though isn't great. One you tube review wondered if the designers actually tried them on and I have to agree. Still for me I want sound quality over build quality and comfort so they are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Could be much better
customer_reviews.text: Could be way much better. I am happy with the sound and how long the battery lasts. Everything is great. But microphone is pretty much terrible as doesn't really want to work with some programs, people barely can hear me unless I use "Discord" or speak in game.. Also range that they still are connected to PC is quite short, about 6-7 meters only..
customer_reviews.author: Kristians K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality overear headset to use with Skype for business
customer_reviews.text: Quality overear headset to use with Skype for business. Sound quality is great, functionality is what you will want. I have tried a few different headsets for this purpose and the quality combined with the battery life is superb. I would highly recommend these. There are a little more expensive that what I have purchased before but the battery life is a real winner when you are on the phone 8 hours a day, they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Bull

customer_reviews.title: Average all round.
customer_reviews.text: Going to say these are all around average. They are very bulky. The plastic creaks a lot as I move around. Mic quality seems average, battery life is great. Not ideal for VR I've gone back to my h800's for this. Battery life on those isnt great though. Bass can be actually too much even when you equalise it out. Oh.. and cant really wear these types of over earphones with glasses, but I knew that buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Used for over 2 years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to recommend a headset to a colleague and realised I've had these for 2 years so thought I'd add a review as they've served me well. The build quality is top notch they've been abused for those 2 years and nothing squeaks or rattles. The battery length is still excellent. The Logitech control panel is a bit lacking can can be tweaked a lot but I tend to ignore it and just use the default settings. The mic is clear and is handy to be able to swing it out of the way which also mutes it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Willis

customer_reviews.title: PC Headset - online meeting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for doing online meetings comfortably on the laptop. Wireless and being able to physically mute the microphone when you are not talking. Mute option was very important for me. When you mute the mic, it beeps and displays an icon on the screen for a second. Also, you can understand when you unmute your mic because you start to hear your own voice, so you don't have to shout :) and amount of this feedback can be adjusted via the Logitech app.
customer_reviews.author: Emre K.

customer_reviews.title: First impressions WOW
customer_reviews.text: I cracked these open and fired up Someone You Loved by Lewis Capaldi on Apple Music. WOW, the midrange is superb. These things are lovely and comfy with lots of room for big ears. Lovely and lightweight. I then fired up some ABGT and the bass is better than expected. Logitech know what they are doing. And I am an audiophile so if you want good sound trust me these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J J Mayes

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it for gaming and watch movies, and I have to admit, it is amazing. The 7.1 with games is so wierd, but it gives you an advantage, you can react faster. And the movies...I watched Silent Hill 1. on bluray and wow...screams from behind me, steps from left and right and sirens infront of me...16 hours with one charge and you can use if you recharge, it is about 40 minutes. Good sound quality and amazing weight and comfortable earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: FloriBa84

customer_reviews.title: Simply the greatest headset I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid user of headphones, I have tried many different brands ranging in prices. These are unquestionably the best I have ever used. The battery life is god tier, noise cancellation is unrivalled, the range is phenomenal and it stays firmly on your head, unlike other headsets such as the Corsair Void. The one downside to this headset is the microphone itself, which is not the best admittedly but works okay enough when needed. It can be easily moved out of the way however so if you’re like me and just use a different mic anyway, it doesn’t matter. For this price it’s a must and trumps any other headset. Cannot recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Pugsley

customer_reviews.title: Good for large heads and large ears
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and large ears, most headsets I have owned would sit on top of my ears which is uncomfortable after a few hours. With these my ears fit inside the ear pads, which makes for some amazing sound quality especially for FPS games. Have been told my mic is low on the PS4, other than that I cannot fault this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: MIC IS AWFUL, BUT HERES WHY I KEPT IT
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn't send back was because there isn't much better for the price. The mic quality is awfully tinny but can be heard pretty well.the surround sound is dodgy, I have it off most of the time but the sound quality in general is brilliant. The range of the headphones is good enough, doors aren't much of a block but walls are. Overall I think if the mic was better and the surround sound was actually surrounding then it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Harry white

customer_reviews.title: New logitech software f'd my headset!
customer_reviews.text: Headset worked great for just over a month, had absolutely no issues until the new logtech software released. I installed at as any person would and it totally f'd my headset. Immediately after installing the left side of my headset blew out for no reason and I now have a constant crackling. My amazon return window was only 1 month so now I'm stuck with a broken headset (through no fault of my own) permanently and cant justify spending the money again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 7.1 sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For fps gaming or anything you need positional sound on this headset is the best I've ever used. (Used Corsair/Sony and few others) While others I've used give me an idea where something is these are the first where I feel I know where something is. The only downsides of the headset are the ear cups, while a decent fit and size the material is meh and could have been better. Outside of that, battery life, latency, and range are top tier. The mic is good for gaming but it's not the best I've seen, it's clear and the noise canceling is good.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Castell

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but price shows it's quality
customer_reviews.text: This headset last plenty of time and is fairly good but as it is fully plastic over the months I've owned it now has become really squeaky and makes funny noises. Absolutely nothing wrong with that as once it's on your head it doesn't make any, but I can't help to ignore it as it i have a other higher quality and much more expensive headsets and they don't share that with this. All in all great for gaming and on a budget with excellent longevity for a full day of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Iliya Petrov

customer_reviews.title: Pin Point Sound Effects
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually wright reviews, but this headset is amazing. Pin point sound, the immersion transforms a game. In Modern Warfare Piccadilly Circus level the sound even changes slightly from underground to street level, the acoustics alter, amazing. The accuracy of sound position is truly brilliant, even planes have accurate positioning, Even drone position can be accurately found. For the money BUY THESE. Every time i use these i am taken aback by the sound. Footsteps,,,,,!!!! well if you want to improve your K/D ratio these are a must. Stand still in game and you can hear every step even coming up staircases.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has gone through many many many headsets due to wire issues i can say this is absolutely worth it. They're extremely comfy my ears don't touch the insides much at all, The sound is beautiful - I won't be using the mic so can't comment on that yet but it's well worth the money if you're looking for a wireless headset with nice comfort i'd say go for this. Logitech never let me down, I will admit that the 7.1 option to turn on is rather.. bad so i keep it off but it still sounds amazing
customer_reviews.author: Aruxa

customer_reviews.title: perfect choice for singleplayer
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. How can tiny speakers like these produce such a mighty bass? I'm impressed! Surround is also spot on, in games and movies! Siting perfecly and covering the whole ear. Noise cancelation is also OK. Not sure how they compare to others in MMO games (especially shooters) but i guess they do a damn good job there as well. Must buy for anybody who wants a rich sound experience whithout the hassle of the wire
customer_reviews.author: Crossfire78

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: They were good while they worked, the left slider will no longer lock in place and now fully extends making them unusable as they will not sit on my head properly. Shame because I really liked them and use lots of Logitech products, they're usually very good quality and durable. Maybe I had a faulty set, but its been over 6 months since I brought them so I doubt I would be able to get them repaired or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: way better than the g930
customer_reviews.text: g930 kept disconnecting no matter what i did, so i refunded and bought this one a few months ago and so far it has only disconnected when i walk outside of my house which is understandable. battery lasts really long at full charge so its great for gaming. mic isn't the best sounding but its better than not having a mic, and its movable so its not in the way when you don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray V.

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice of headset - 8/10
customer_reviews.text: This headset is damn near perfect, it's a comfy overear style headset giving your ears a break from being squished. The cups are made from soft fabric making them easy to wear for long periods of time, whilst maintaining it's noise cancelling effectiveness. The wireless range on these are amazing, I can be downstairs and one room across from my PC and still be talking with friends on discord without any signal drop out or delay. The only negative aspects I have are the fact that the Mic isn't detachable and the blue tooth only works with the usb, meaning you can't use the headset with your phone/other devices. Overall, a solid choice for avid gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Cool headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are nice and comfortable. The sponge around the ears is soft and the material is better than leather. One down side is the ear pieces flip from side to side quite easily. The foam on the head piece needs some more. The sound quality is amazing with the 5 little speakers in each ear piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: These have really nice sound. The software for them is great and come on leaps and bounds over the years. I used to hate Logitech software but now i prefer it over Corsair's. The headset charges quickly & is relatively light weight. The cushion is a bit noisy but you don't here it when gaming. Nice headset for the price
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great. But get Bluetooth headphones if you can.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. With 2 downsides. They don't "sleep" if you don't switch them off when they aren't in use then the battery will drain. Happens to me a lot. Secondly the USB dongle is a full size piece of plastic and you need to keep it safe or plugged in forever! Would suggest finding a Bluetooth compatible headset to avoid having more stuff to not lose.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I use the headset on a Gaming Laptop for 5-6 hours at a time, Games, Video/Voice chats and watching films. Very comfortable with excellent sound quality. Range is adequate at 7meters, I would prefer a better range, as I do tend to walk around the house while on voice chats. The 2 inch Wireless Dongle is a bit flimsy, care should be taken if using a laptop, constant removal can break internal connections, tho easily repaired with a decent soldering iron. I would recommend this Headset. I have used mine for well over a year with no problems. I have just bought another G533 as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Signal Range
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset to replace my damaged G930. I prefer the ear padding on the G930 but the on/off switch is a better design on the G530 and best of all it has better range. My previous headset would work around 90% of my house but the G530 seems to have a slightly better receiver so it covers the last 10%. This small benefit stuck out to me because the small number of dead spots in my home were irritating and now they're gone.
customer_reviews.author: FreeZey

customer_reviews.title: Returned after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on warehouse as new perfect and they were very good when working although a little bulky for my son. The microphone stopped working after 3 days so returned through Amazon with no issue and got money back. Not sure worth the money anyway
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Headset
customer_reviews.text: Not used these for gaming but they have been brilliant for conference calls, movies and music. The distance in which you can be from the PC is more than what I was expecting, especially with such thick walls in the house. It also has a good weeks worth of battery life which is good as it doesn't need to be pluged into the pc that much. Overall cracking product.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wireless Headset
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my problematic Logitech G933 and I am really impressed. Great sound quality in games, very comfortable (big heads friendly :) ) and long battery life. Build quality is better that G933, although in terms of sound quality G933 was a little bit "bassier". I have been using it for nearly 3 months and never had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: CriticOS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and superb sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound from these, perfect for gaming, watching movies and listening to music. I use the windows generic usb driver instead of the Logitech one as the sound is about twice as loud and it sounds much better. Had to switch off auto-update in the logitech software though as it would replace the driver whenever there was an update.
customer_reviews.author: Akira

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic, I can not say anything bad about them except that it does not have a PTT button. I use Mumble and if I need to "local" chat and not "global" chat, I don't get this option. My scenario is, I wanted a set of wireless headphones so I could go for a smoke and keep and eye on my PC through the window while being able to participate in Mumble comms.
customer_reviews.author: sdenv

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: As I sit at my desk for a large amount of the day the comfort was very important to me. These are well padded and in my opininon the quality is great (I'm not a sound expert by any means!) Having spent time on Skype to friends they all say the mic quality is good. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Lewis G D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned the G430 with the horrid long cable and decided to upgrade to this. The sound seems to be the same decent quality but the G533 is louder. The microphone quality is however not as good but it does it job for game communication, it could be worse. The wireless feature works as intended but it cuts out for me if I'm moving too fast or about 6/7 meters away, not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Imran

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine for its price but wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: At first when i looked at this headset it checked all the boxes for me , after few days of having it i decided to return it and here’s why : - The battery life isn't as advertised and u cant use it even if its plugged in you have to let it charge on it’s own - it really really tires ur head after a while - the mic isn’t that good there are some good things though : - the 7.1 surround sound - the wireless connectivity - the software
customer_reviews.author: omar sabry

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headphones! Especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: These are just GREAT! The surround sound is actually really good; I’m able to locate enemy footsteps on either side of me and also above and below! Really amazing! Make sure you use the Logitech Gaming Software to maximise the gaming experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones! Comfortable, not to tight, not too loose. Doesn't make my ears sweat. Very good sound quality, strong (but not annoyingly strong) bass. No annoying hissing or white noise. Good range. So far I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: IWantSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Dodgy Microphone
customer_reviews.text: Even when not talking to anyone, you can hear your own voice echoing. It seems that when something is spoken into the mic it plays into the headphones. The mic also pics up too much such as you can hear the air when the mic is on. Also, it is not mentioned that the headset is not Bluetooth and is wireless through a USB. Apart from this, the sound and build is very good and i have enjoyed using the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Annonomas

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage constantly rapid-fire connects and disconnects, turning itself off and on again at random, when plugged in. Caused tons of software and hardware problems. Bought this in the first place to be able to plug it in and keep going when needed, but can't even keep using the computer reliably with it plugged in. Will it explode using a third party mains to USB? I'm actually hoping it will for all the frustration!
customer_reviews.author: ShaggyNeckBeard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly average
customer_reviews.text: I am not the type of person that would normally wear headphones to game however I have come to understand recently that it adds a whole level of immersion that I had never experienced before. That being said, though not a true "audiophile" I am able to recognise and appreciate good sound quality (used to be a DJ) and while gaming with this headset is decidedly better than gaming without I don't believe that this headset is any better than an average set of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Crown

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, comfortable, noise cancellation is great, and the quality of the microphone is really good. Battery seems to last for a long time too, which is great for a wireless headset.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound but below average mic
customer_reviews.text: For such an expensive headset, I was shocked to hear the poor mic quality. I actually cannot believe how this passed Logitechs quality control! One star knocked off for that
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad U. Imran

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones but one slight issue
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! The sound is amazing, they're so comfy to wear and surprisingly light weight compared to their durability. But.. the issue. After every charge, i endlessly hear an electro-static shock/ click in one (sometimes both) ears and it will go on and off for an hour or so. Drives me mental but apart from this, worth the purchase EDIT Another issue now found is that the battery dies within an hour or 2... this needs to be fixed
customer_reviews.author: lewis

customer_reviews.title: Superb Wireless Headset
customer_reviews.text: Simply brilliant headset, i came from a Razer Nari headset and this just blows it away, the surround sound and audio positioning and 7.1 sound is far better than Razer's and overall quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Joff

customer_reviews.title: Good, but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, the battery life is great, but there is one big flaw. The headset is very uncomfortable and loos on my head. It always falls off my head if I look down or up. it feels like it is about fall off my head when I look down at my keyboard. I don't know why but for some reason Logitech decided to my the part that goes over your head start at the front, not in the middle, so there are no comfortable positions. I am always aware that it is on my head and have to keep re-adjusting it. would not buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Hugo.L

customer_reviews.title: 1st Class, and a good deal from the warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from amazon warehouse as nearly new. Arrived looking like new, with all films still on the headphones. great sound quality and build quality is good...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peter C. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality in almost all aspects.
customer_reviews.text: For the same money you could get some ATH-M50x's which produce far better sound, the microphone is awful and overall quality is poor. The "surround sound" is also a very poor software effect. The only positive is the wireless (of which the lack of delay and connectivity is very good). Unless you REALLY need an inbuilt mic and wireless these are a poor choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ijcurry

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with the software making it sound weird, after removing the logitech software it worked fine, charges pretty fast also, its comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Jhilt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Surround sound is a real game changer. Incredible in-game audio. The attached microphone is well below average though. Fortunately I did not buy it for the mic. as I have an external one. Wireless works well with little to no latency. Comfortable enough to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: perfect head phones
customer_reviews.text: perfect headset, perfect for games like pubg to hear foot steps ect, good for movies as well and great for music has the perfect amount of bass treble and sounds well defined and clear, the mic is also really really clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for every use
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product. The sound is very good but not out of the box. You have to calibrate the sound for what you want it to use it. The bass is excellent also. 7.1 for gaming is very good. Watching movies also is great with this headset. As a program use the logitech gaming. Install the program before you connect the headset and it will detect it as soon as you connect and install the drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Geo T

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend this headphones
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this headset because of charging failrue - it stopped charging after 3 month of use. Battery was fine, cable was fine, even pc connection via usb was fine but still no charging. And it's common problem as far as I know. Some pros: - good battery time - they can be realy loud if you want to - noice cancelation is not bad Cons: - UNRELIABLE
customer_reviews.author: Egor

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is meh quality but I was mostly looking for a good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I hear a buzzing sound in the right ear when the receiver is plugged in and I use them wireless, I guess I can live with it as it usually gets drowned out by the things I'm listening to. Microphone is meh quality but I was mostly looking for a good pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with these headphones...so they must be good because he is "very fussy" about them having that quality sound. Good strong bass and great for gaming he said.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby.

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a couple of days and it's been a great headset soo far. but the headset don't last 16 hours id say more 12 on a full charge but it's not an issue as you can charge it while using it soo not all bad. i normaly just charge it when my computer is asleep and it's ready for when i log on.
customer_reviews.author: vegnachaos

customer_reviews.title: No power saving feature
customer_reviews.text: This has no power saving feature, meaning if you forget to switch the power button to the off position it won't power down like practically every wireless headset out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dominic Parker

customer_reviews.title: Headset has a nice sound signature for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Headset has a nice sound signature for gaming, is comfortable and the battery is decent. I got a solid 15 hours use per charge. The microphone however had no noise cancelling at all. Logitech's support went as far as "reinstall the driver" then nothing. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience, I received the product to replace my ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience, I received the product to replace my old faulty headset that worked for around a month and when I the headset on and started to play some games my ears began to itch and I developed a rash from the ear cups, they were very abrasive and harsh on my ears. The sound quality was OK for a wireless headset but the itchiness really ruined it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Deutrom

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: The best gaming headphones out there they do work on pc and ps4. I don't have a xbox so dont know if it works. The sound quality is amazing you can hear every footstep and hear where is coming good for game like cod.
customer_reviews.author: SARANDOM

customer_reviews.title: I was looking at headsets around of £150 when a friend recommended these. I am happy to confirm these are ...
customer_reviews.text: A superb pair of headphones. I was looking at headsets around of £150 when a friend recommended these. I am happy to confirm these are excellent and cost under £100. Now they are even cheaper than when i got them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Baileygates

customer_reviews.title: its bliss no outside noise
customer_reviews.text: nice sound for gaming and talking connected straight away nice quality stand to hold them though hat to log and claim that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but bad microphone
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very comfy headset but the quality of the microphone is not the best, it sound almost like a cheap webcam mic. Overall a good purchase but much better if you have a stand-alone desk mic.
customer_reviews.author: aaron ward

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: These are great earphones, sound quality is excellent. The mic not so great. I get feedback from other players saying it sounds like I am talking like I've had dental surgery or something. But other than that these are great. Battery life is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Simlrs

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound but Poor Mic
customer_reviews.text: The headset has a Good quality sound and even has a surround sound option however the microphone sounds grainy and one of my friends described it as 'you sound like your speaking through a tin can' I don't know if this is a global issue but it's annoying so I'm going to put it back into it's box and just use my old headset again
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Darnley

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Headset is easy to use, and was pretty much plug and play no messing around with drivers. Mic is clear and the sounds are great - very useful for getting rid of wires around the desk
customer_reviews.author: Zytherman

customer_reviews.title: Love Logitech!
customer_reviews.text: Just wish they blocked out a bit more sound. Nice and Lightweight, easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Alex Neale

customer_reviews.title: Decent performance at this price level
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned cordless cans before so nothing to compare against, but: They’re comfortable for long periods and the sound is good - clear with decent levels of bass. The microphone does the job but the sound is a little bit thin to my ears when a recording is played back. But the price is very good so makes these a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jezz Heald

customer_reviews.title: Big meh, much better options for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre at best, go for something else unless you really want Logitech kit
customer_reviews.author: Shell N' Jord

customer_reviews.title: Good however ... I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was an amazing headset for both gaming an communication alike easy to set up, basic control and a lot of versatility.... However after 4 months of use the charging port on the headset had sheared away therefore resulting in it breaking and becoming unusable That the only downside to the headset other than that good
customer_reviews.author: Jamie white

customer_reviews.title: I would not spend that money again.
customer_reviews.text: They are not worth just because they give us jaw pain every time we use it so we don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Gargallo

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife, she really likes them. Says she really likes how the cups rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good quality no hastle wireless headset.
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault these, I've had no issues at all. Were easy to set up and last all day with non-stop use. Quick to charge and the audio is really good quality. I've had wireless headsets with all sorts of problems, but non after 4 months of use with this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming, as it has excellent mic quality compared to most headsets I've used, plus the sound quality is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Ryan Warrener

customer_reviews.title: Gift for myself 😆😆
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and mic performance, the wire is long enough so you can charge and play at the same time! Extendable mic which you can move up to mute! Bought myself this headset and my partner the hyperx stinger I prefer mine :)
customer_reviews.author: catherine rashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase.well worth the money.reallygood sound quality. I’m really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G-HUB software hungs every day
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, bulky, very big USB dongle. But the worst thing is Logitech software, it hungs almost every day, loosing connection, etc. Unfortunately, without Logitech G-HUB you can not enable DTS, so there is no way to use it reliably in Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headset for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Cancels or noise out, perfect hearing and really comfortable. The only thing I would change is the size of the ear parts to a slightly smaller size other than that I’d recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ronan Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Audio quality for gaming & music etc.
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality many audio outputs to choose from & its wireless witch is even more of a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great audio, okay mic, but not the most comfortable for very long gaming sessions
customer_reviews.author: Julian Viani-Pericchi

customer_reviews.title: Long life batery
customer_reviews.text: I'm pc gamer and its perfect headphones for fps games, enable surround sound only for music. in fps shooters like csgo i hear everything like eagle :) compare to previous headphones I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jrs

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but microphone breaks after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is really good in this headset, but the reason I have gave it a 1 star review is because after less than a year of using the headset, the microphone starts to only work at certain angles and eventually stops working all together. I believe it is a hardware issue inside the headset, to do with the wires. I have taken great care of the headset and never dropped it but suddenly the microphone stops working after about 6 months. Overall, a good headset for sound but the mic will most likely stop working quite quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coxall

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present fo my son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Broke Dongle. ✅ 🎧
customer_reviews.text: Really like the headset overall nice sound quality and good build quality on the headset. On the USB dongle it has broke on me and I have to get a new one, overall really nice except that USB.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: good sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: worth the purchase the sound is clear and the bass is punchy. i got from the warehouse so the price was ok
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money! I use these with my PlayStation 4 and can pinpoint gunfire from multiple locations. I definitely recommend updating the software before using, you definitely tell the difference with the surround sound and noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These were great, right up until they wouldn't recharge, then they got returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back
customer_reviews.text: Something about these headphones makes the surround sound seem extremely artificial and I couldn’t seem to get a good stereo sound either. It’s a shame because they look great and were well made
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and great sound quality. after a few months of use the battery seems to run out faster, so I have to have it plugged in a lot, so for that I took a star away.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Undro

customer_reviews.title: My son is very happy with this especially as the price was less during ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with this especially as the price was less during black Friday. Hopefully this will also resolve the regular cable death of all the wired headsets to date!
customer_reviews.author: Low Energy

customer_reviews.title: it's sturdy, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: While this item is a little bulky, it's sturdy, looks nice, fits comfortably on your head and over your ears fully, the 7.1 surround sound is amazing for knowing which direction sound is coming from when gaming, the microphone is disabled when up and doesn't get in the way, when down it seems to work just fine and the bluetooth dongle makes it easy to just plug in and use. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage son for Christmas. Great price, good product, prompt delivery and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane  Dryland

customer_reviews.title: Best headset
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset my son has had according to him. He says the sound is great and he likes all the features.
customer_reviews.author: mrs gillian edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wireless!
customer_reviews.text: Toilet and listen to the menu music of ur fav game !
customer_reviews.author: Kelics

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound & mic
customer_reviews.text: audio was very low when i had everything on max volume the microphone sounded very tinny and robotic was expecting alot more from a 100 euro headset it was comfy and good bluetooth but all the main aspects lack and i will never order a logitech headset again
customer_reviews.author: Sean byrne

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is REALLY bad. You're talking 30 mins-1hr ...possible a tiny amount longer before having to charge again. The sound is alright, the mic is good but the battery life is really subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem however, the customer service is very good and they helped resolve this problem. Overall great customer service. A great company that realises that mistakes happen and taking responsibility for them only makes them better. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Haaroon

product_meta.title: Logitech G533 Wireless Gaming Headset, 7.1 Surround Sound, DTS Headphone:X, 40 mm Pro-G Drivers, Noise-Cancelling Mic, 2.4 GHz Wireless, Lightweight, 15 h Battery Life, PC/Mac - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:HeadsetThe Logitech G533 Wireless Gaming Headset features Pro-G audio drivers and DTS Headphone:X 7.1 surround technology with the ability to recreate the in-game environmental effects and positional audio game designers intended you to hear. This PC headset gives you the convenience and freedom of wireless, without compromising on clear, booming audio.The advanced wireless capabilities are what makes this one of the best gaming headsets - you get up to 15m range with lossless digital audio transmission, delivering incredible sound. And with up to 15 hours of battery life, you can keep gaming on a single charge. You can even check your battery level mid-play with the Logitech Gaming Software.With enhanced materials and manufacturing techniques, the G533 wireless gaming headset is designed to be durable, yet lightweight. The breathable mesh ear pads ensure hours of comfortable play, and they can even be removed for easy cleaning.With a noise-cancelling microphone on a folding extending boom and easy-to-reach volume control roller and mic mute button, this wireless headset is the ideal choice for a truly enhanced gaming experience. Complete with Logitech gaming software for audio fine-tuning and customisation. System requirement : Windows 10, Windows 8.1, or Windows 7, Mac OS X 10.11 or later

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.

BOX CONTAINS
• Performance gaming headset • USB charging cable • USB wireless adapter • User documentation• 2-year manufacturer's guarantee and full product support

See more
feature_bullets: 7.1 Surround Sound : The G533 wireless headset technology accurately recreates the in-game environmental and positional sound effects
Pro-Grade Wireless : The G533 gaming headset has enhanced lossless digital audio transmission, delivering wireless convenience and high fidelity sound with none of the wires
High Performance Design : Using high-quality materials and manufacturing techniques, Logitech’sG533 is designed to be durable, yet lightweight, ideal to wear for hours
Extended Battery Life : Enhanced power management for high efficiency from the rechargeable, replaceable battery this wireless headset delivers non-stop marathon gaming sessions on a single charge

Fine-Tune Controls : The G533 stereoheadset has an improved noise-cancelling microphone, easy to reach volume control roller and a mic mute button. Plus, you can use Logitech gaming software to fully customise your sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,010 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
